        public static void createShapeLib()
                           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                  java.io.IOException
        Creates/recreates the shape library, overwriting existing files
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if a shape file can't be written
        java.io.IOException - if errors occur during serialization of a shape file

        Returns:
